title: "How DOE Researchers Are Using AI And Robots To Design The Successor To Lithium-Ion Batteries"
excerpt: "Building the better battery may be too big a job for humans, according to researchers at the Joint Center for Energy Storage Research, so the researchers are turning to artificial intelligence to find the right ingredients and to robots to make and test them."
